remarks: The degree of a product of polynomials is at most the sum of degrees. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)
statement:
dgradd.1 $e |- M = ( deg ` F ) $.
dgradd.2 $e |- N = ( deg ` G ) $.
dgrmul2 $p |- ( ( F e. ( Poly ` S ) /\ G e. ( Poly ` S ) ) -> ( deg ` ( F oF x. G ) ) <_ ( M + N ) ) $.
